system.specialRules:
Traits: Anti-Air (Advanced), Enclosed, Tracked Vehicle

Special Rules: When successfully hitting an enemy Aircraft with Autocannons, count as having performed a Half-Action Aim (+10 to hit) for all subsequent hits against that aircraft until aircraft is destroyed, new target fired at, or firing stopped. Both Autocannons must fire at same target, which is done as a single Attack Action.
